items.sentence: If you tell a lie enough times, you begin to believe it.
The recommendation from my boss made all the difference.
Any teacher that can be replaced by a machine should be.
The day will surely come when your dream will come true.
Tom came down to breakfast still dressed in his pajamas.
Someone told me that this plant only grows in Australia.
The likelihood of being attacked by a shark is very low.
This is the best seafood restaurant in the neighborhood.
It's not easy to translate a poem in a foreign language.
It's hard to say what the weather will be like tomorrow.
